glosses: To swallow. (to cause to pass from the mouth into the stomach)
To not (or be able to) pronounce some letters or syllables.
To fall for, to be taken in by, to believe.
To hold oneself not say something one wanted to say.

etymology:
Inherited from Ottoman Turkish یوتمق (yutmak), from Proto-Turkic *yūt-.
Cognates
Azerbaijani udmaq
Kazakh жұту (jūtu)
Turkmen ýuvutmak
Uyghur يۇتماق (yutmaq)
Uzbek yutmoq
